entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. A few wet flurries inland this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
